title: Erotic Massage the Touch of Love: An Illustrated Step by Step Manual for Couples
description: Perusing the page of this book is like having a romantic interlude - and that's just what it promises for couples. Dozens of explicit, yet tasteful drawings illustrate this easy to use guide to erotic therapy as an intimate, whole body experience. Erotic Massage is an almost poetic love book especially for lovers interested in exloring the physical dimensions of a healthy relationship.
author: Kenneth Ray Stubbs
